@package engine-io-yesod

module Network.EngineIO.Yesod

-- | A drop in <a>ServerAPI</a> that works in Yesod's <tt>Handler</tt>

yesodAPI :: (MonadHandler m, MonadBaseControl IO m) => ServerAPI m
